sn14.4:1.2: “Dhatunanattam, bhikkhave, paticca uppajjati phassananattam, phassananattam paticca uppajjati vedanananattam.
sn14.4:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, dhatunanattam paticca uppajjati phassananattam, phassananattam paticca uppajjati vedanananattam?
sn14.4:2.2: Cakkhudhatum, bhikkhave, paticca uppajjati cakkhusamphasso, cakkhusamphassam paticca uppajjati cakkhusamphassaja vedana …pe…
sn14.4:2.3: manodhatum paticca uppajjati manosamphasso, manosamphassam paticca uppajjati manosamphassaja vedana.
sn14.4:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, dhatunanattam paticca uppajjati phassananattam, phassananattam paticca uppajjati vedanananattan”ti.
